data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=6HVz1XMEOwYQ7kNvgHryQBx&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBJkhry7gGPoFFfHuU0qI0aBw2zNGUwkRabX9-ZUz-xmQ&oe=66E4229C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=f8KNQ89kBe4Q7kNvgETFQrX&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCm8VzCGO1Oqq4AoGOjmUnbFxdWIkP7BOT4_pVC27LUsQ&oe=66E42C24)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Fd2UCJdyyB0Q7kNvgFcCj2R&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCR54WyTcFn0jszAX2t6y2eqZSVY3HabISPd7DVdQ-ZEA&oe=66E41387)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=rJV5GnFvkFsQ7kNvgEpMBxp&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAKQ2PtEEwsjDI3GLHIpvv1_UuqbV-abSntkhj1S2P-nA&oe=66E40666)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=DQr0Ji-563wQ7kNvgECC3o1&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDjjACxyNEQtjjLmyQpQfgY55cOcWoKsaJ5wkuLP8YQng&oe=66E432D8)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=qtdGaajWx-0Q7kNvgG3Lbo_&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDbi94ZZo-M5XJAD2NjyG4VwktunQxDkL25h13reD29fw&oe=66E42F59)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=XBNq9NwXaMMQ7kNvgEz7AJI&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBfjdMk7Jc0O7m6F7-ibUpHJeNcaEuomvkt3DstKXwVIA&oe=66E41570)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=7wzTfh_NjZ0Q7kNvgE78Zmk&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCT4ioiLT0XkdJV5VzMOvjO1uw-l9BYFeX34IEAXevOzQ&oe=66E3FFEA)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=fOYo0iFoooYQ7kNvgFWpZBB&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAgFBS_T8uf4HhmBliMrarbRGyAuKN06Q86sFpn--mi_A&oe=66E41397)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ssE8iSy5m70Q7kNvgEApSST&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDkFm-No0kQ5edYP38FFbxJcH2YUtrlUsuMV7ljnBpmPA&oe=66E42F0C)
